overall.description:
Return the character for the minimum-size type to which given types can
be safely cast.

typechars.description: If a list of strings, each string should represent a dtype. If array_like, the character representation of the array dtype is used.

typeset.type: str or list of str, optional
typeset.description: The set of characters that the returned character is chosen from. The default set is ‘GDFgdf’.

default.description: The default character, this is returned if none of the characters in typechars matches a character in typeset.

typechar.description: The character representing the minimum-size type that was found.
